quiz.title: Do you have any secret crush from your contacts  who you admire and dream to start conversation with?

questions.value: I don’t have any secret crush.

quiz.title: Why are you interested in our application?

questions.value: I want to find my love using your App
I want to start communicating with my secret crush using Anonymous Messages option
I want to use it for fun and prank my friends
I just like mystery and would like to check if I have any Secret Admirers

quiz.title: Let’s imagine you started conversation as a Secret Admire, would you like to be recovered, if your feelings are mutual?

questions.value: Yes if I’m sure that it’s mutual
No, I want to stay secret
I don’t care. I don’t want to be a Secret Admirer

quiz.title: Why do you think anonymous communication is more convenient than just text a person openly?

questions.value: That helps you to learn each other better before having any relationships openly.
Because I’m LGBTQ and I’m afraid that my crush is not, so I want to talk anonymously before.
I’m too shy to talk openly.
I like both approaches, depending on the situation.
I don’t like anonymous communication, I prefer to talk with people openly.
